reasoning: This describes the specific domain or genre of language being studied.
This describes the specific type of grammar being induced for the task.
This describes the type of system being built, which takes an input and produces a rhyming output.
This is the specific type of lyrics used in the research, representing the data or resource.
This describes the approach used to learn the grammar, which does not rely on labeled data.

entity: a priori linguistic or phonetic knowledge
reasoning: This refers to pre-existing knowledge that is not used in the method, highlighting its unsupervised nature.
This is used to evaluate the quality of the generated lyrics.
This refers to the individuals who assess the fluency of the output.
This refers to a type of existing model that is being compared to the new approach.
